```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(scatterplot3d)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("data/training.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
pca <- prcomp(df[,2:ncol(df)], scale. = TRUE)
summary(pca)
```


```{r}
pc1 <- pca$x[,1]
pc2 <- pca$x[,2]
pca_plot <- data.frame(pc1, pc2)
ggplot(pca_plot, aes(pc1, pc2)) +
  geom_point(aes(color=df$class)) + 
  ggtitle("PCA 2d plot")
```
